check.name: DataQualityScopePresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Data Quality Scope concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept DataQualityScope is present."
if(DataQualityScope is not None and len(DataQualityScope) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "DataQualityScope concept is not present"
return False
